Borghal

Back to work
Today is my first day back to work after the holiday time off I used for moving to Maine. Since I don't have a home office yet (because I don't have a home yet) I'm working from a coworking space in downtown Portland. Being able to walk to work is great, second only to wfh!#Maine #ThinkTank #Portland
